Santa_Barbara.San Marcos High School (Santa Barbara, C: San Marcos High School is an American public high school located in a suburban area two miles from the city of Santa Barbara, California. Accredited through the Western Association of Schools and Colleges, the school was named a California Distinguished School in 1994 and 2005, and a Gold Ribbon School in 2015. The school caters for a significant number of students from first generation and non-English speaking families.
